A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The best of the Star Wars films imo\, as long as you can watch it without nostalgia and hoping it does all the things previous Star Wars films had done (which many of you were crying about after 7). The most complete characters of the franchise\, the best look at any villain before\, cinematically clean and exciting\, it makes sense of 1\,2\,3 (which should make it elite on its own) and gives us a great allegory for where we are in the world today. Anybody complaining about it is just sad they weren't chosen to write/direct it.
